author: nspiegelberg
msg: HBase: refresh internal branch from trunk
Summary:
See CHANGES.txt for summary of changes.
Among other things, this brings in:
HBASE-2694  Move RS to Master region open/close messaging into ZooKeeper
(Karthik)
HBASE-2345  Add Test in 0.20 to Check for proper HDFS-200 append/sync
support
(Nicolas Spiegelberg via JD)
HBASE-2786  TestHLog.testSplit hangs (Nicolas Spiegelberg via JD)
HBASE-2790  Purge apache-forrest from TRUNK
HBASE-2793  Add ability to extract a specified list of versions of a column
in a single roundtrip (Kannan via Ryan)
HBASE-2828  HTable unnecessarily coupled with HMaster
(Nicolas Spiegelberg via Stack)
HBASE-2265  HFile and Memstore should maintain minimum and maximum
timestamps
(Pranav via Ryan)
HBASE-7     Provide a HBase checker and repair tool similar to fsck
(dhruba borthakur via Stack)
Test Plan:
1. mvn test ran fine.
2. installed on a 5 node cluster, made sure WEB UI etc. was functional.
Todo:
3. Running load test right now against cluster. Seems to be ok so far.
4. Will try to run some App Server load against it. (Ruifang has a wiki page on
this. Will try it out).
Next steps:
DiffCamp Revision: 133757
Reviewed By: nspiegelberg
CC: isaac, davidrecordon, nspiegelberg, achao, kannan, hbase@lists
Revert Plan:
OK
